Test Name: Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), PCR, Nasal Swab
Purpose: To detect the mecA gene of Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) DNA for clinical diagnosis and epidemiological studies.
Container: Nasal swab transport tube containing appropriate transport media
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, nucleic acid extraction kit, vortex mixer, microcentrifuge, pipettes with filter tips
